name: View Switch (Hall Studios Games)
description:
View Switch, switch your view

This is a updated version of View Switch for the Nokia Game Jam 

https://hallstudiosinc.itch.io/view-switch-jam-version 

View Switch, a game where you need to switch your view to get to the end!

This game isn't finished and will be updated with better graphics, more levels, bosses, and more!

Comment your thoughts
